message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm happy to start the price at $15,000. What do you think?

Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate your enthusiasm, but I believe I can find the product elsewhere for a lower price. I am willing to pay up to $10,000 for the product. Let me know if this is something we can work with.
Hi Bob, thanks for your reply. I understand your price point, however, $15,000 is already a very competitive offer for this product. To meet you halfway, I can do $13,500. This is my final offer.

Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While I understand the value of the product is higher than my initial offer, I still believe I can find it elsewhere for a lower price. I am willing to pay up to $12,000 for the product. This is my final offer.
